## About

The UGA & UT Workshop is the XXth Edition of the collaborative workshop between the University of Grenoble and the University of Tsukuba, aiming to XXX. 

We will bring together both the EMO, Multiple Criteria Decision-Making (MCDM) communities, and other related fields and, moreover, focusing on solving real-world problems in government, business and industry.

## Conference Implementation

The UGA & UT Workshop  will be held as an online conference. The conference organizers will make all presentations available for all attendees through the Internet during the workshop
